Events that occurred on 4 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1892 - Arthur Tolkien sends a letter to his mother about his new son.
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 9.
1940 - Voice actor David Collings is born.
1961 - Actor Graham McTavish is born.
1966 - Author and linguist Arden R. Smith is born.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Ken Jackson.
1991 - Actress Olivia Tennet is born.
2005 - Biographer and editor Humphrey Carpenter dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south along the Misty Mountains.
